problem_names: lemma (in group) lcos_self: "[| x \<in> carrier G; subgroup H G |] ==> x \<in> x <# H"

lemma (in subgroup) elemlcos_carrier:
  assumes "group G"
  assumes acarr: "a \<in> carrier G"
    and a': "a' \<in> a <# H"
  shows "a' \<in> carrier G"

lemma (in subgroup) lcos_module_imp:
  assumes "group G"
  assumes xcarr: "x \<in> carrier G"
      and x'cos: "x' \<in> x <# H"
  shows "(inv x \<otimes> x') \<in> H"

lemma (in subgroup) lcosets_carrier:
  assumes "group G"
  assumes XH: "X \<in> lcosets H"
  shows "X \<subseteq> carrier G"

lemma (in group) lcosets_part_G:
  assumes "subgroup H G"
  shows "\<Union>(lcosets H) = carrier G"

lemma (in group) lcosets_subset_PowG:
     "subgroup H G  \<Longrightarrow> lcosets H \<subseteq> Pow(carrier G)"

lemma (in group) lcos_disjoint:
  assumes "subgroup H G"
  assumes p: "a \<in> lcosets H" "b \<in> lcosets H" "a\<noteq>b"
  shows "a \<inter> b = {}"

lemma (in group) inj_on_f':
    "\<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G;  a \<in> carrier G\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> inj_on (\<lambda>y. y \<otimes> inv a) (a <# H)"

lemma (in group) inj_on_f'':
    "\<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G;  a \<in> carrier G\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> inj_on (\<lambda>y. inv a \<otimes> y) (a <# H)"

lemma (in group) inj_on_g':
    "\<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G;  a \<in> carrier G\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> inj_on (\<lambda>y. a \<otimes> y) H"

lemma (in group) l_card_cosets_equal:
     "\<lbrakk>c \<in> lcosets H;  H \<subseteq> carrier G; finite(carrier G)\<rbrakk>
      \<Longrightarrow> card H = card c"

theorem (in group) l_lagrange:
     "\<lbrakk>finite(carrier G); subgroup H G\<rbrakk>
      \<Longrightarrow> card(lcosets H) * card(H) = order(G)"
translations: lemma (in group) lcos_self: "[| x \<in> carrier G; subgroup H G |] ==> x \<in> x <# H"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>x \<in> carrier G; subgroup H G\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> x <# H
apply (simp add: l_coset_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>x \<in> carrier G; subgroup H G\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>xa\<in>H. x = x \<otimes> xa

apply (blast intro: sym r_one subgroup.subset [THEN subsetD]
                    subgroup.one_closed)

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done
text \<open>Elements of a left coset are in the carrier\<close>

lemma (in subgroup) elemlcos_carrier:
  assumes "group G"
  assumes acarr: "a \<in> carrier G"
    and a': "a' \<in> a <# H"
  shows "a' \<in> carrier G"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a' \<in> carrier G
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a' \<in> carrier G
interpret group G

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Group.group G
by fact

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a' \<in> carrier G
from subset and acarr

proof (chain)
picking this:
  H \<subseteq> carrier G
  a \<in> carrier G
have "a <# H \<subseteq> carrier G"

proof (prove)
using this:
  H \<subseteq> carrier G
  a \<in> carrier G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a <# H \<subseteq> carrier G
by (rule l_coset_subset_G)

proof (state)
this:
  a <# H \<subseteq> carrier G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a' \<in> carrier G
from this and a'

proof (chain)
picking this:
  a <# H \<subseteq> carrier G
  a' \<in> a <# H
show "a' \<in> carrier G"

proof (prove)
using this:
  a <# H \<subseteq> carrier G
  a' \<in> a <# H

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a' \<in> carrier G
by fast

proof (state)
this:
  a' \<in> carrier G

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
text \<open>Step one for lemma \<open>rcos_module\<close>\<close>

lemma (in subgroup) lcos_module_imp:
  assumes "group G"
  assumes xcarr: "x \<in> carrier G"
      and x'cos: "x' \<in> x <# H"
  shows "(inv x \<otimes> x') \<in> H"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv x \<otimes> x' \<in> H
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv x \<otimes> x' \<in> H
interpret group G

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Group.group G
by fact

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv x \<otimes> x' \<in> H
from xcarr x'cos

proof (chain)
picking this:
  x \<in> carrier G
  x' \<in> x <# H
have x'carr: "x' \<in> carrier G"

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> carrier G
  x' \<in> x <# H

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x' \<in> carrier G
by (rule elemlcos_carrier[OF is_group])

proof (state)
this:
  x' \<in> carrier G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv x \<otimes> x' \<in> H
from xcarr

proof (chain)
picking this:
  x \<in> carrier G
have ixcarr: "inv x \<in> carrier G"

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> carrier G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv x \<in> carrier G
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  inv x \<in> carrier G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv x \<otimes> x' \<in> H
from x'cos

proof (chain)
picking this:
  x' \<in> x <# H
have "\<exists>h\<in>H. x' = x \<otimes> h"

proof (prove)
using this:
  x' \<in> x <# H

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>h\<in>H. x' = x \<otimes> h
unfolding l_coset_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  x' \<in> (\<Union>h\<in>H. {x \<otimes> h})

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>h\<in>H. x' = x \<otimes> h
by fast

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>h\<in>H. x' = x \<otimes> h

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv x \<otimes> x' \<in> H
from this

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<exists>h\<in>H. x' = x \<otimes> h

obtain h
        where hH: "h \<in> H"
        and x': "x' = x \<otimes> h"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<exists>h\<in>H. x' = x \<otimes> h

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>h.
        \<lbrakk>h \<in> H; x' = x \<otimes> h\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  h \<in> H
  x' = x \<otimes> h

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv x \<otimes> x' \<in> H
from hH and subset

proof (chain)
picking this:
  h \<in> H
  H \<subseteq> carrier G
have hcarr: "h \<in> carrier G"

proof (prove)
using this:
  h \<in> H
  H \<subseteq> carrier G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. h \<in> carrier G
by fast

proof (state)
this:
  h \<in> carrier G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv x \<otimes> x' \<in> H
note carr = xcarr x'carr hcarr

proof (state)
this:
  x \<in> carrier G
  x' \<in> carrier G
  h \<in> carrier G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv x \<otimes> x' \<in> H
from x' and carr

proof (chain)
picking this:
  x' = x \<otimes> h
  x \<in> carrier G
  x' \<in> carrier G
  h \<in> carrier G
have "(inv x) \<otimes> x' = (inv x) \<otimes> (x \<otimes> h)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  x' = x \<otimes> h
  x \<in> carrier G
  x' \<in> carrier G
  h \<in> carrier G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv x \<otimes> x' = inv x \<otimes> (x \<otimes> h)
by fast

proof (state)
this:
  inv x \<otimes> x' = inv x \<otimes> (x \<otimes> h)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv x \<otimes> x' \<in> H
also

proof (state)
this:
  inv x \<otimes> x' = inv x \<otimes> (x \<otimes> h)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv x \<otimes> x' \<in> H
from carr

proof (chain)
picking this:
  x \<in> carrier G
  x' \<in> carrier G
  h \<in> carrier G
have "\<dots> = (x \<otimes> inv x) \<otimes> h"

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> carrier G
  x' \<in> carrier G
  h \<in> carrier G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv x \<otimes> (x \<otimes> h) = x \<otimes> inv x \<otimes> h
by (metis ixcarr l_inv m_assoc r_inv)

proof (state)
this:
  inv x \<otimes> (x \<otimes> h) = x \<otimes> inv x \<otimes> h

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv x \<otimes> x' \<in> H
also

proof (state)
this:
  inv x \<otimes> (x \<otimes> h) = x \<otimes> inv x \<otimes> h

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv x \<otimes> x' \<in> H
from carr

proof (chain)
picking this:
  x \<in> carrier G
  x' \<in> carrier G
  h \<in> carrier G
have "\<dots> = h \<otimes> \<one>"

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> carrier G
  x' \<in> carrier G
  h \<in> carrier G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<otimes> inv x \<otimes> h = h \<otimes> \<one>
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  x \<otimes> inv x \<otimes> h = h \<otimes> \<one>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv x \<otimes> x' \<in> H
also

proof (state)
this:
  x \<otimes> inv x \<otimes> h = h \<otimes> \<one>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv x \<otimes> x' \<in> H
from carr

proof (chain)
picking this:
  x \<in> carrier G
  x' \<in> carrier G
  h \<in> carrier G
have "\<dots> = h"

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> carrier G
  x' \<in> carrier G
  h \<in> carrier G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. h \<otimes> \<one> = h
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  h \<otimes> \<one> = h

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv x \<otimes> x' \<in> H
finally

proof (chain)
picking this:
  inv x \<otimes> x' = h
have "(inv x) \<otimes> x' = h"

proof (prove)
using this:
  inv x \<otimes> x' = h

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv x \<otimes> x' = h
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  inv x \<otimes> x' = h

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv x \<otimes> x' \<in> H
from hH this

proof (chain)
picking this:
  h \<in> H
  inv x \<otimes> x' = h
show "(inv x) \<otimes> x' \<in> H"

proof (prove)
using this:
  h \<in> H
  inv x \<otimes> x' = h

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv x \<otimes> x' \<in> H
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  inv x \<otimes> x' \<in> H

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
text \<open>Left cosets are subsets of the carrier.\<close>

lemma (in subgroup) lcosets_carrier:
  assumes "group G"
  assumes XH: "X \<in> lcosets H"
  shows "X \<subseteq> carrier G"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. X \<subseteq> carrier G
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. X \<subseteq> carrier G
interpret group G

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Group.group G
by fact

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. X \<subseteq> carrier G
from XH

proof (chain)
picking this:
  X \<in> lcosets H
have "\<exists>x\<in> carrier G. X = x <# H"

proof (prove)
using this:
  X \<in> lcosets H

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>x\<in>carrier G. X = x <# H
unfolding LCOSETS_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  X \<in> (\<Union>a\<in>carrier G. {a <# H})

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>x\<in>carrier G. X = x <# H
by fast

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>x\<in>carrier G. X = x <# H

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. X \<subseteq> carrier G
from this

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<exists>x\<in>carrier G. X = x <# H

obtain x
        where xcarr: "x\<in> carrier G"
        and X: "X = x <# H"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<exists>x\<in>carrier G. X = x <# H

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>x.
        \<lbrakk>x \<in> carrier G; X = x <# H\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by fast

proof (state)
this:
  x \<in> carrier G
  X = x <# H

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. X \<subseteq> carrier G
from subset and xcarr

proof (chain)
picking this:
  H \<subseteq> carrier G
  x \<in> carrier G
show "X \<subseteq> carrier G"

proof (prove)
using this:
  H \<subseteq> carrier G
  x \<in> carrier G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. X \<subseteq> carrier G
unfolding X

proof (prove)
using this:
  H \<subseteq> carrier G
  x \<in> carrier G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x <# H \<subseteq> carrier G
by (rule l_coset_subset_G)

proof (state)
this:
  X \<subseteq> carrier G

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma (in group) lcosets_part_G:
  assumes "subgroup H G"
  shows "\<Union>(lcosets H) = carrier G"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union> (lcosets H) = carrier G
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union> (lcosets H) = carrier G
interpret subgroup H G

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. subgroup H G
by fact

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union> (lcosets H) = carrier G
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Union> (lcosets H) = carrier G
apply (rule equalityI)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<Union> (lcosets H) \<subseteq> carrier G
 2. carrier G \<subseteq> \<Union> (lcosets H)
apply (force simp add: LCOSETS_def l_coset_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. carrier G \<subseteq> \<Union> (lcosets H)
apply (auto simp add: LCOSETS_def intro: lcos_self assms)

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done

proof (state)
this:
  \<Union> (lcosets H) = carrier G

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma (in group) lcosets_subset_PowG:
     "subgroup H G  \<Longrightarrow> lcosets H \<subseteq> Pow(carrier G)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. subgroup H G \<Longrightarrow> lcosets H \<subseteq> Pow (carrier G)
apply (simp add: LCOSETS_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. subgroup H G \<Longrightarrow>
    (\<Union>a\<in>carrier G. {a <# H}) \<subseteq> Pow (carrier G)
apply (blast dest: l_coset_subset_G subgroup.subset)

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done

lemma (in group) lcos_disjoint:
  assumes "subgroup H G"
  assumes p: "a \<in> lcosets H" "b \<in> lcosets H" "a\<noteq>b"
  shows "a \<inter> b = {}"
proof -
interpret subgroup H G

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. subgroup H G
by fact
from p

proof (chain)
picking this:
  a \<in> lcosets H
  b \<in> lcosets H
  a \<noteq> b
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  a \<in> lcosets H
  b \<in> lcosets H
  a \<noteq> b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<inter> b = {}
apply (simp add: LCOSETS_def)
apply (metis inf.cobounded1 inf.cobounded2 l_repr_independence subgroup_axioms subset_empty subset_iff)

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done

proof (state)
this:
  a \<inter> b = {}

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
text\<open>The next two lemmas support the proof of \<open>card_cosets_equal\<close>.\<close>

lemma (in group) inj_on_f':
    "\<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G;  a \<in> carrier G\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> inj_on (\<lambda>y. y \<otimes> inv a) (a <# H)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G; a \<in> carrier G\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> inj_on (\<lambda>y. y \<otimes> inv a) (a <# H)
apply (rule inj_onI)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G; a \<in> carrier G; x \<in> a <# H;
        y \<in> a <# H; x \<otimes> inv a = y \<otimes> inv a\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x = y
apply (subgoal_tac "x \<in> carrier G & y \<in> carrier G")

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G; a \<in> carrier G; x \<in> a <# H;
        y \<in> a <# H; x \<otimes> inv a = y \<otimes> inv a;
        x \<in> carrier G \<and> y \<in> carrier G\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x = y
 2. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G; a \<in> carrier G; x \<in> a <# H;
        y \<in> a <# H; x \<otimes> inv a = y \<otimes> inv a\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> carrier G \<and> y \<in> carrier G
prefer 2

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G; a \<in> carrier G; x \<in> a <# H;
        y \<in> a <# H; x \<otimes> inv a = y \<otimes> inv a\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> carrier G \<and> y \<in> carrier G
 2. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G; a \<in> carrier G; x \<in> a <# H;
        y \<in> a <# H; x \<otimes> inv a = y \<otimes> inv a;
        x \<in> carrier G \<and> y \<in> carrier G\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x = y
apply (blast intro: l_coset_subset_G [THEN subsetD])

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G; a \<in> carrier G; x \<in> a <# H;
        y \<in> a <# H; x \<otimes> inv a = y \<otimes> inv a;
        x \<in> carrier G \<and> y \<in> carrier G\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x = y
apply (simp add: subsetD)

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done

lemma (in group) inj_on_f'':
    "\<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G;  a \<in> carrier G\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> inj_on (\<lambda>y. inv a \<otimes> y) (a <# H)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G; a \<in> carrier G\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> inj_on ((\<otimes>) (inv a)) (a <# H)
apply (rule inj_onI)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G; a \<in> carrier G; x \<in> a <# H;
        y \<in> a <# H; inv a \<otimes> x = inv a \<otimes> y\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x = y
apply (subgoal_tac "x \<in> carrier G & y \<in> carrier G")

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G; a \<in> carrier G; x \<in> a <# H;
        y \<in> a <# H; inv a \<otimes> x = inv a \<otimes> y;
        x \<in> carrier G \<and> y \<in> carrier G\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x = y
 2. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G; a \<in> carrier G; x \<in> a <# H;
        y \<in> a <# H; inv a \<otimes> x = inv a \<otimes> y\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> carrier G \<and> y \<in> carrier G
prefer 2

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G; a \<in> carrier G; x \<in> a <# H;
        y \<in> a <# H; inv a \<otimes> x = inv a \<otimes> y\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> carrier G \<and> y \<in> carrier G
 2. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G; a \<in> carrier G; x \<in> a <# H;
        y \<in> a <# H; inv a \<otimes> x = inv a \<otimes> y;
        x \<in> carrier G \<and> y \<in> carrier G\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x = y
apply (blast intro: l_coset_subset_G [THEN subsetD])

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G; a \<in> carrier G; x \<in> a <# H;
        y \<in> a <# H; inv a \<otimes> x = inv a \<otimes> y;
        x \<in> carrier G \<and> y \<in> carrier G\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x = y
apply (simp add: subsetD)

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done

lemma (in group) inj_on_g':
    "\<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G;  a \<in> carrier G\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> inj_on (\<lambda>y. a \<otimes> y) H"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G; a \<in> carrier G\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> inj_on ((\<otimes>) a) H
by (force simp add: inj_on_def subsetD)

lemma (in group) l_card_cosets_equal:
     "\<lbrakk>c \<in> lcosets H;  H \<subseteq> carrier G; finite(carrier G)\<rbrakk>
      \<Longrightarrow> card H = card c"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>c \<in> lcosets H; H \<subseteq> carrier G;
     finite (carrier G)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> card H = card c
apply (auto simp add: LCOSETS_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G; finite (carrier G);
        x \<in> carrier G; c = x <# H\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> card H = card (x <# H)
apply (rule card_bij_eq)

proof (prove)
goal (6 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G; finite (carrier G);
        x \<in> carrier G; c = x <# H\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> inj_on (?f9 x) H
 2. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G; finite (carrier G);
        x \<in> carrier G; c = x <# H\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ?f9 x ` H \<subseteq> x <# H
 3. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G; finite (carrier G);
        x \<in> carrier G; c = x <# H\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> inj_on (?g9 x) (x <# H)
 4. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G; finite (carrier G);
        x \<in> carrier G; c = x <# H\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ?g9 x ` (x <# H) \<subseteq> H
 5. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G; finite (carrier G);
        x \<in> carrier G; c = x <# H\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> finite H
 6. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>H \<subseteq> carrier G; finite (carrier G);
        x \<in> carrier G; c = x <# H\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> finite (x <# H)
apply (rule inj_on_g', assumption+)

proof (prove)
goal (5 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.

theorem (in group) l_lagrange:
     "\<lbrakk>finite(carrier G); subgroup H G\<rbrakk>
      \<Longrightarrow> card(lcosets H) * card(H) = order(G)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>finite (carrier G); subgroup H G\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> card (lcosets H) * card H = order G
apply (simp (no_asm_simp) add: order_def lcosets_part_G [symmetric])

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>finite (carrier G); subgroup H G\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> card (lcosets H) * card H =
                      card (\<Union> (lcosets H))
apply (subst mult.commute)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>finite (carrier G); subgroup H G\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> card H * card (lcosets H) =
                      card (\<Union> (lcosets H))
apply (rule card_partition)

proof (prove)
goal (4 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>finite (carrier G); subgroup H G\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> finite (lcosets H)
 2. \<lbrakk>finite (carrier G); subgroup H G\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> finite (\<Union> (lcosets H))
 3. \<And>c.
       \<lbrakk>finite (carrier G); subgroup H G; c \<in> lcosets H\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> card c = card H
 4. \<And>c1 c2.
       \<lbrakk>finite (carrier G); subgroup H G; c1 \<in> lcosets H;
        c2 \<in> lcosets H; c1 \<noteq> c2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> c1 \<inter> c2 = {}
apply (simp add: lcosets_subset_PowG [THEN finite_subset])

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>finite (carrier G); subgroup H G\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> finite (\<Union> (lcosets H))
 2. \<And>c.
       \<lbrakk>finite (carrier G); subgroup H G; c \<in> lcosets H\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> card c = card H
 3. \<And>c1 c2.
       \<lbrakk>finite (carrier G); subgroup H G; c1 \<in> lcosets H;
        c2 \<in> lcosets H; c1 \<noteq> c2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> c1 \<inter> c2 = {}
apply (simp add: lcosets_part_G)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>c.
       \<lbrakk>finite (carrier G); subgroup H G; c \<in> lcosets H\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> card c = card H
 2. \<And>c1 c2.

        c2 \<in> lcosets H; c1 \<noteq> c2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> c1 \<inter> c2 = {}
apply (simp add: l_card_cosets_equal subgroup.subset)
apply (simp add: lcos_disjoint)

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done
